<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sa_pattern"><sa_pattern action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><ci_type>u_cmdb_ci_special_hardware</ci_type><cpattern_type>3</cpattern_type><description/><directory>false</directory><enforce_proc_classy>false</enforce_proc_classy><invoke_per_account>false</invoke_per_account><metadata_id>9684ad38470416105afe9889316d436f</metadata_id><name>Special Hardware Discovery</name><ndl>pattern {
	metadata {
		id = "9684ad38470416105afe9889316d436f"
		name = "Special Hardware Discovery"
		citype = "u_cmdb_ci_special_hardware"
		apply_to_os_families = "ALL"
		apply_to_os_types = "ALL"
	}
	identification {
		name = "discovery"
		entry_point {type = "*"}
		find_process_strategy {strategy = NONE}
		step {
			name = "First Step"
			match {
				eq {
					"1"
					"2"
				}
				terminate_op = terminate
			}
		}
	}
}
</ndl><parent/><serverless>false</serverless><source/><sys_class_name>sa_pattern</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>narendrabekkem</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-08-13 15:53:32</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9684ad38470416105afe9889316d436f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Special Hardware Discovery</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="GlobalScopeChagnes" source="bd98deaf9765311081a6bb46f053af78">bd98deaf9765311081a6bb46f053af78</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace/><sys_scope display_value="GlobalScopeChagnes">bd98deaf9765311081a6bb46f053af78</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sa_pattern_9684ad38470416105afe9889316d436f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>narendrabekkem</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-08-13 15:53:32</sys_updated_on><version/></sa_pattern></record_update>
